publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3529 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates Bankhead Academy pupils, Andrew Grosvenor, Michael Sinclair and Drew Forbes, for raising £1,544 for charity by abseiling off the Forth Rail Bridge and wishes the school’s fundraising committee all the best for its next venture, a ceilidh on 15 December 2005.

S2M-3529 Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen (lodged on 7 November 2005) Robin Harper*, Michael Matheson*, Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Eleanor Scott*, Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3529 Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen (lodged on 7 November 2005) Shiona Baird*
S2M-3529 Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen (lodged on 7 November 2005) Mr David Davidson*

S2M-3529 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates Bankhead Academy pupils, Andrew Grosvenor, Michael Sinclair and Drew Forbes, for raising £1,544 for charity by abseiling off the Forth Rail Bridge and wishes the school’s fundraising committee all the best for its next venture, a ceilidh on 15 December 2005. Supported by: Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Richard Lochhead, Roseanna Cunningham, Eleanor Scott, Fergus Ewing, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Jamie Stone, Shiona Baird, Mr David Davidson, Rosie Kane*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3529 Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen (lodged on 7 November 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3529 Congratulations to Bankhead Academy, Aberdeen (lodged on 7 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
